favourite.article: Let's fight and pay the price!

I made to realize that without Him I am really really nothing. How I need Him to be the center, testimony and meaning of my life. Saints rise up, let's march on for His testimony; as an army testifying and fighting for His economy.
PRAISE THE LORD!!! What an encouraging song. For the LORD`S UP-TO-DATE MOVE, let's FIGHT and PAY the PRICE. ENTER and POSSESS the LAND, our ALL-INCLUSIVE CHRIST.
